sourcesContent:
BMI Calculator calculate BMI, or Body Mass Index, is a measure of body fat based on a person's weight and height. It is commonly used to determine if a person is underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese. BMI can help individuals assess their overall health and potential risks for diseases associated with excess weight

Weight / Height ^ 2 = BMI
Weight Weight can't be null Please enter a valid positive number & only accept 2 - 3 integer and 1 decimal. / Height Height can't be null Please enter a valid positive number & only accept 3 integer and 1 decimal.
Your BMI is {{ bmi | number: '1.1-1' }}
How can I determine if my weight is within a healthy range as an adult aged 18 years or older?
